TEXT.S: Dragan Bender Dragan Bender hya'ga NBA pgnaw' mari' misuw qaniy, qutux sa pzyang pkaki' tay kska'. kawas tay 1997, ryax sa tay 17 nqu tay 11, Dragan Bender, squliq na p'unro. pincyuwagan nya' pspngan mari sa may yugal yacing qnxan na sraral 1997 kawas 11 byacing 17 ryax, Dragan Bender htgan November ru apljina,suruw lga,musa beh Herzegovina. 12 kawas lga,t'aring suruw mzyu mari maki Nikola Vuj i mzyu mari pqwasan biru. qnxan nya Bender's qsuyan mlikuy mzyu mari na pqwasan biru maki MarylandTerrapins. hiya pqbaq ke na ego maki mrkyas,mita ega na Amerika rangi ru The Fresh Prince of Bel Air .
